name: Cave Escape!
description:
This was created as part of a collaborative project for the academic year 2021/22. The aim was to create a set of mechanics to overcome a series of obstacles, which included a gap and a wall. We also created hazards to add some challenge to the game, which was compiled of rocks (stagnant and falling) and a flying enemy.

We hope you enjoy the game, and any feedback on bugs and improvements would be greatly appreciated, and I hope you enjoy this short showcase of mechanics.
